response.original_title: The Best of the Danny Kaye Show
response.overview: This collection of highlights from the Emmy award winning variety program The Danny Kaye Show include the famous host performing with such celebrities as Gene Kelly, Harry Belafonte, Ella Fitzgerald, Art Carney, Rod Serling and more, while the cast of regulars included such future television stars as Jamie Farr and Harvey Korman.
response.title: The Best of the Danny Kaye Show
